input.sentences: when i got in town i went for a walk .
there were many unique shops there .
i bought a few things and then walked around some more .
after a while i went to my hotel .
output.sentences: The day began with a leisurely walk around town.
We admired the unique buildings and quaint shops everywhere.
I couldn't help but stop into a shop as we walked, and bought a souveneir.
I saw many houses I would love to live in along the way.
By the time we got back to the hotel, we were happy and tired.
